aka: The Edge of the Broken Moon

cast.name: 玛莎·洛巴诺娃 Masha Lobanova
纳德兹达·伦波娃 Nadezhda Lumpova
安娜·谢佩列娃 Anna Shepeleva
维柯托里娅·托尔斯托加诺娃 Viktoriya Tolstoganova
爱恩·兹甘什娜 Era Ziganshina

trans_title: The Edge of the Broken Moon
introduction: Fourteen-year-old Sonia finds out that for years her mother has been lying to her about the death of her father, unable to forgive the betrayal she runs away. the mother and the elder sister sasha find sonia at their old country house which has been abandoned years ago. forced to spend several days in the house where once they lived as a happy family, they have no choice but to talk about all the problems and insults which they have been trying to sidestep for a long time.源自：http://moscowfilmfestival.ru/miff45/eng/films/?id=45024
